name: Fantasy Dragon World
description:
Fantasy Dragon World is a 3D RPG turn-based adventure game that tells the story of a brave man seeking and destroying the big devil who wants to destroy the world.
Multi-language support.
Players will play the blood of legendary brave men and defeat the great devil who is trying to control the world. If you want to get through customs, you must continue to knock down the various demons that appear in and around the world and earn experience and money. Experience points can be upgraded. Money can buy more powerful equipment and medicines, which can increase player's abilities. Players gather intelligence and clues from all over the world and complete the main clues to get through.
